item.title: Chuck Berry - Run Rudolph Run - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas - Very easy
Run Rudolph Run - Chuck Berry Written by Johnny Marks and Marvin Brodie
Using the chords: C F G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Chuck Berry - Sweet Little Sixteen - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C
Chords Used: G7, C, F
As performed by Chuck Berry
Tutorial Video (GCEA): https://youtu.be/qvXLcSfORcU
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Chuck Berry - Sweet Little Sixteen - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of D.
Chords Used: A7, D, G
As performed by Chuck Berry
Tutorial Video (GCEA): https://youtu.be/qvXLcSfORcU
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is based on Chordette for Education (available at ukefarm.com, but the education baritone font is not available).
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Chuck Berry - Johnny B. Goode - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Chuck Berry, transposed up a whole step. I had wanted to make this video play along video since hearing about Chuck Berry's passing in March of 2017. So here it is four months later.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
